title: Epic Empire
controls: Use the left mouse button or tap the screen to interact with the game UI.
description: Epic Empire: Tower Defense is a thrilling strategy game where you command powerful heroes and towers to protect your kingdom from waves of evil forces. Embark on an epic adventure through vibrant worlds, from frozen kingdom, soaring magical kingdoms, dark underground tunnels, and enchanted florists. Face unique challenges worldwide as you battle to reclaim territories overrun by enemies.

title: Construction Set New
controls: PC
Left mouse button = choose a piece
Right mouse button = zoom
Mobile
Tap = choose a piece
Double tap and hold = zoom
description: Construction Set - 3D Builder is a creative building puzzle game that lets you step into the role of a master builder. You’ll design and assemble intricate 3D structures, piece by piece, turning simple parts into impressive creations. Challenge your skills, unleash your imagination, and watch your architectural masterpieces come to life.

title: Cube 2048 Casual
controls: Use the left mouse button or tap the screen to interact with the game UI.
description: Try your best to reach 2048! Move your numbered block by clicking and swiping in a direction. You can also move by clicking on the onscreen arrow buttons. When your block touches another block with the same number, the number on your block doubles.

title: Obby World Arcade
controls: WASD / arrow keys = move
Space = jump
P = pause
J = avatar customize
Tab = show/hide cursor
description: Obby World: Squid Escape is a casual parkour game where you jump your way through a whirlwind of obstacles and surprising challenges. Anything is possible in the variety of games offered. You will find yourself leaping across deadly gaps, racing through winding tracks on a speedy bike, and making daring escapes from high-security prisons. Each mode offers new thrills, so get ready to test your reflexes

title: Mad Guns
controls: WASD = move
R = reload
Left click = shoot
Tab = menu
description: Mad GunS - Battle Royale is a wacky royal battle where chaos rules and anything can be a weapon. Arm yourself with bananas, handbags, or even hamster guns as you take on zombies, giant turkeys, and wild octopuses in outrageous online modes. Explore unique maps, craft your own levels, and fight to save Mr. Cat in this explosive pixel showdown.

title: Cube Stories New
controls: The goal of the game is to escape from the room. In order to get out of the room, you need to solve all the riddles and puzzles. In order to interact with an object, you need to click on it or move it.
description: Immerse yourself in a fascinating plot and follow a brave video blogger who bravely goes into the dark embrace of an abandoned mansion. As you make your way through each carefully designed room, you'll encounter a series of cryptic puzzles and mind-bending challenges that will test your intelligence, observation, and creative thinking. As the plot develops, you will be plunged into the darkness of the house's past and the mysterious history of its former inhabitants. Uncover the secrets hidden behind the walls and unravel the truth behind the urban myth, all while facing the Riddler's devious traps on your path to freedom. Key Features: - Exciting plot. - Challenging puzzles. - Intuitive controls. - Hidden hints.

title: Find Pair 3D Casual
controls: Drag objects onto the round platforms at the bottom of the screen.
To complete the level, you need to find all pairs of objects.
description: Welcome to the game "Find a Pair 3D". In this game, the player is tasked with finding two identical items from a pile of objects and merging them. For every successfully merged pair, the player earns one star. As the player progresses through levels, new and increasingly diverse items appear, making the game more challenging. The goal is to merge as many pairs as possible to accumulate stars. Additionally, the game features a leaderboard where players can compare their scores and compete for the top position. The higher the level, the more difficult the item combinations become, adding excitement and complexity to the gameplay.

title: Dragon Hunter Arcade
controls: The goal of the game is to visit all locations, passing them by killing monsters on your way. Control - touch/click.
description: Choose your character, roll the dice and go on a fun adventure. Click on monsters - help the hero survive and defeat the legendary dragons in the clicker RPG Dragon Hunter. Luck and a strong phone glass will determine the fate of the dragon hunter. ★ FEATURES: ● Click to attack the enemy and help the hero ● Level up your character to unlock unique skills. ● Use battle magic to change the outcome of the battle ● Roll the dice to determine your character's fate ● Defeat your opponents to get gold and rare loot ● Find rare pets to increase your combat power ● Fight or avoid combat to achieve the main goal ● Collect trophies by defeating various monsters ● Play mini games to get better rewards ● Complete quests during your adventure ● Collect the treasure map from the pirate captain ● Clear the ruins of various monsters for a reward ● Defeat epic bosses in the tournament

title: Command Strike
controls: The goal of the game is to visit all locations, passing them by killing monsters on your way. Control - touch/click.
description: Welcome to a new shooter game! Take part in a real commando mission! Here you’ll find classic and favorite features of shooting games. About Command Strike FPS: - various maps for battles - offline games modes: Deathmatch, Flag capture, Missions - weaponry: powerful guns & pistols - simple shooting controls - action-packed gameplay Use your skills to become a super soldier - get a gun and join battles! It’s time to complete special commando missions!

title: Find Sort Match New
controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.
description: Find Sort Match is an exciting and addictive puzzle game that challenges your observation and matching skills. In this game, you'll be presented with a variety of colorful objects scattered across the screen. Your task is to quickly find and sort matching items into their respective categories before time runs out. With each level, the difficulty increases, introducing new objects and more complex sorting challenges. Test your reflexes

title: Hidden Object Island Casual
controls: The goal of the game is to find all the hidden objects in the locations
PC control - left-click on a hidden object
Control on a mobile device - tap on a hidden object
description: Discover the ultimate hidden objects game and embark on a journey through stunning locations, captivating puzzles, and mysterious adventures!Step into the world of hidden secrets and surprises, where every location tells a story. From serene beaches and tranquil Japanese gardens to magical flying houses and rustic fishing villages, this game takes you to breathtaking destinations. Uncover the secrets behind each scene as you search and find hidden objects, solve the puzzles and collect rare treasures!

title: Ragdoll Rock Climber Arcade
controls: Your goal is simple but challenging - climb higher, push the limits and reach the top.
PC controls: Left and right mouse button.
On your phone: Tap the left and right half of the screen.
description: Embark on an adrenaline-pumping climb in the ultimate test of skill and determination! Ragdoll Rock Climber is a thrilling third-person mobile experience that challenges you to conquer the heights.

title: Soccer Dash
controls: Drag the left mouse button to aim and release to kick the ball.
description: Soccer Dash is a casual soccer game where you play as the ball. Aim and control the soccer ball around obstacles and other players trying to obstruct you until the end. The game will go into a slow-motion state when you choose the direction of the kick, so take your time.

title: Fortress of the Wizard New
controls: Left mouse button = use spells
QE / 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8 / mouse wheel = select spells
Right mouse button / W = select fireball spell
description: Fortress of the Wizard is a magical defense adventure where you become a mighty sorcerer guarding your stronghold from relentless demon hordes. Harness an arsenal of devastating spells—fireballs, icy waves, swirling tornadoes, meteors, and more—to crush the invasion. Every battle tests your timing, strategy, and mastery of the arcane arts as you fight to protect your realm

title: Tank Battles 2d Casual
controls: The goal of the game is to destroy all opponents on each level. The opponents may be tanks, towers, bosses, and so on.
Controls on the desktop: AD/arrows for movement, LMB for shooting.
Control on a mobile device: touch/swipe.
description: Play cartoon tanks! Welcome to the best World War II tank battle game! Get ready to experience the thrill of controlling your own tank in epic battles that will test your strategic skills and combat prowess. In this game, you will control a cartoon-style tank and engage in intense battles with enemy tanks on various World War II-themed battlefields. Use your wits and tactical prowess to outsmart your opponents, evade enemy fire, and fight your way to victory.

title: little Shop Arcade
controls: Full store management - from orders to product display
Development and improvement - expand and modernize your business
Social elements - visit friends and their stores
Strategic approach - analyze demand and increase profits
Customization - design the store to your taste
description: Welcome to the world of trade! In this exciting game, you will become the manager of your own store. Order goods, place them on the shelves and serve customers to earn money and grow your business. Improve the interior, expand the trading area and monitor demand to become the most successful entrepreneur!

title: Epic Racing
controls: W = move forward
S = move backward
A = steer left
D = steer right
P = pause
R = reset car position
Left-mouse click = interact with the game UI
For mobile devices, use the game interface
description: Epic Racing - Descent on Cars is a high-speed demolition showdown where racing isn’t just about speed—it’s about survival. Crash, clash, and careen down wild tracks packed with brutal obstacles. Choose your car, master the chaos, and brace for bone-rattling impacts as you race to victory in a metal-twisting frenzy.

title: Runic Curse New
controls: WASD / arrow keys = move
Space = jump
Left mouse button = fight and select
Shift = roll
1, 2, 3 = abilities
Tab = menu
M = map
description: Runic Curse is an action-adventure game where you step into the boots of Adrian, a shipwreck survivor stranded on a mysterious island. As you explore ancient ruins and cursed lands, uncover the secrets behind the Rune Curse and search for your lost crew. Face danger, solve mysteries, and embrace your fate in a world shrouded in shadows.
